content:
I've found the habit stacking technique to be really helpful. I've also been using the implementation intention strategy, where I specify when and where I'll perform a new habit. For example, I've been trying to start a meditation habit, so I've committed to meditating for 10 minutes every morning right after I brush my teeth. It's been really helpful in making the habit stick.

I've also been using a habit tracker app to track my progress. It's been really motivating to see my streaks and watch my habits grow over time. I've also been reflecting on my habits and behaviors by writing in a journal. It's been helpful in identifying patterns and areas where I need to improve.
